title: FS or T T206 HOF 5 card lot (moved to ebay)
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: FS or T T206 HOF 5 card lot (moved to ebay)
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I have some extra HOFers.  Was asking $400 delivered or would have considered trading the lot for low end Carolina Brights or BL 350 HOFer.  I have some cash if there is some difference to be made up.
Also looking for AB 350 Eddie Collins.

I moved these cards to ebay to see how they do.  Seller ID is sampson21 please let me know if any questions.  Thanks!

Thanks as always,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
